page_content: The page discusses a new sports database (NDS) and provides download links for mobile apps and instructions for J+S Coaches.
The page discusses the use of solar energy for heating and electricity production in Switzerland.
The page provides information on civil and criminal justice procedures in Switzerland.
The page provides information on the Polymechaniker profession, including the use of software for programming and operating machines.
The page provides a PDF download for a questionnaire guide for farmers from the year 2012.
The page discusses an online lost and found service operated by the Thurgau Cantonal Police, where users can report lost items and search for them.
The page discusses the administrative and personnel management of land registry and notary offices, including the use of the EDV-Grundbuch software TERRIS.
